doc.previous: An approach to identify migration intensity makes use of upward pointing microphones to record the nocturnal contact calls of flocks flying overhead These are then analyzed in a laboratory to measure time frequency and species 90
doc.after: An older technique to quantify migration involves observing the face of the moon towards full moon and counting the silhouettes of flocks of birds as they fly at night 91 92
